short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Revolution in SQL and Pals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The world's only SQL_Pal.

An extension that is helpful for people I work with, and basically no one else.

1) Adds variable declarations to SQL queries
2) Builds insert statements from SSMS query results
3) Format comma delimited list
